txt.en: Historians are unique in that they have access to the Scholarly arts, allowing them to research ancient lore and use their discoveries to the advantage of their fellows.  In addition, a Historian has the more practical talents of cultivating land, and forging the blades that are so often spoken of in the histories they study.  Do you wish to learn this trade?  (SCHOLAR, WEAPONSMITH, FARMER)
Historians are the caretakers of lore and legend that the forces of light dare not forget.

Historians are unique in that they have access to the Scholarly arts, allowing them to research ancient lore and use their discoveries to the advantage of their fellows.  In addition, a Historian has the more practical talents of cultivating land, and forging the blades that are so often spoken of in the histories they study.  Do you wish to learn this trade?  (SCHOLAR, WEAPONSMITH, FARMER)
